body: Laura Agustín at The Naked Anthropologist ,  writes about the efforts of Miss Michigan Katie LaRoche, a participant in the Miss America pageant, to rescue victims of sex trafficking in Nepal. LaRoche has launched her own organization One World.One Future  to raise awareness against trafficking and slavery.

title: Nepal: Miss America To The Rescue
